text: Pretty sure I missed a permissions change on copy. Will fix.
nice
Their B1M has manual keystone adjustment. Jealous.
Makes me wonder if we can get a firmware update for ours to enable it
:thumbsup:
@joel Getting enter and exit events almost every second.
most likely because the camera is seeing a lot of noise on the cooktop and false-calling it as an enter event
try running cooktop.py --debug and seeing how much noise you're getting
ok
install update from PIT:
cooktop, UI and node server all up and running clean
so far, i like this thread
Luke is out getting reflective tape so we can calibrate
took a ton of notes on the install process, currently rolling everything into an install package that I will test before leaving
so much better off a clean Ubuntu install
nice

<@U02618EV1>: also seeing a string of enter/exits on this rig as well. i'll dig into it before I leave. Since it was there when a pan was present, I suspect it was because the pot circle is disappearing for a frame and therefore triggering an exit event. I'll make objects a little more persistent in cooktop.py so dropped frames don't trigger false enter/exits
Sounds good.
<@U026PHQ3J> / <@U02E3CRMA> I'm seeing a delay on video playback when displaying a measurement or snapshot. Do you happen to know if anything changed here from a backend perspective?
Is that running on rig, or running on laptop
Rig
Yeah, ignore rig performance right now. Its hard to say what state its in
especially anything like video
given that I'm using default video drivers :simple_smile:
Perfect. Thanks.
Yep. I'll be in Friday to do a full reinstall. Performance is really good on this rig with the new os rev.
YAY!
Glad it's alive and running well
How's the client?
client(s)
<@U02688JHZ> Got the residual heat functionality working whenever you want to take a look.
Client is great. Some minor fixes to get done Friday, but ready to show next week.

if you have notes, will you send them, or add to trello? (not sure if you have technical notes or if any UI/functionality stuff came up). Not urgent. Just want to make sure we have a central location for all bugs/fixes we're chasing.
Will do. Rolled almost everything into git as I was working. Going to replicate their setup first thing Friday, dial everything in and push a package update by eod.
<@U02618EV1> looks like the enter and exit events are from pot noise. Will fix in cooktop
Nice. Thanks for representing!
Good.
Thanks, <@U02E3CRMA> !! Happy Birthday and Happy Holidays!
Thanks!! Merry Christmas everyone, and see you Friday.
